ygData.subject: Re: appearance, charm song
ygData.msgSnippet: The blackened iron crown DOES show up. Looks just like a chain coif with a donut in black :) I am a half elf tooo and think it is hideous looking..but with the
ygData.messageBody:
The blackened iron crown DOES show up. Looks just like a chain coif with a donut in black :) I am a half elf tooo and think it is hideous looking..but with the right accesories its not bad.

Elyana Silvanae
Bardess of the 35th chorus
Ambassador to the Ridgerunners
Innoruuk Server




>Sounds like the Blackened Iron Crown should work for you. Its AC5 invisible I believe, >and ads 5 to STR and 5 to all resistances, found in RunnyEye I hope to get one myself >someday.

> Kitasi

>Regarding appearance:
>As a bard I am interested in my appearance to my audience. Of course
>protecting my hide is also important! I am searching for effective
>armor which is either invisible or attractive (not a tin pot on the
>head) for a female half-elf.
